# Leaven - Artisan GraphQL Library for Bun Runtime

> Leaven is a high-performance GraphQL library hand-crafted for the Bun runtime. Like the best bread, it's risen to perfection with document caching, real-time subscriptions, and a delightful developer experience.

## Quick Facts

- **Name**: Leaven (named after the rising agent in bread)
- **Type**: GraphQL Library
- **Runtime**: Bun (JavaScript/TypeScript)
- **License**: Apache 2.0
- **Author**: Pegasus Heavy Industries LLC
- **Website**: https://leaven.dev
- **Repository**: https://github.com/PegasusHeavyIndustries/leaven
- **Theme**: Bakery/Artisan Bread (because it makes your API rise!)

## Installation (Getting Your Ingredients)

```bash
# Using Bun
bun add @leaven-graphql/core graphql

# Using pnpm
pnpm add @leaven-graphql/core graphql

# Full bakery experience with all packages
bun add leaven graphql
```

## Packages (The Pastry Case)

- **@leaven-graphql/core**: The sourdough starter - core execution engine with document caching
- **@leaven-graphql/http**: The serving counter - HTTP server for Bun with playground
- **@leaven-graphql/ws**: Hot & fresh delivery - WebSocket subscriptions (graphql-ws)
- **@leaven-graphql/context**: Kitchen prep station - request context with AsyncLocalStorage
- **@leaven-graphql/errors**: Burnt batch handler - error handling and formatting
- **@leaven-graphql/schema**: Recipe blueprints - schema building utilities
- **@leaven-graphql/plugins**: Secret ingredients - plugin system for extensibility
- **@leaven-graphql/playground**: Tasting room - GraphQL Playground/GraphiQL
- **@leaven-graphql/nestjs**: Professional kitchen - NestJS framework integration

## Key Features (Our Specialties)

1. **Blazing Hot Performance**: Fresh from the Bun oven with native APIs
2. **Buttery Type Safety**: Smooth TypeScript that melts into your workflow
3. **Flaky Modularity**: Layer by layer, take only what you need
4. **Plugin Proofing**: Let your API rise with extensible plugins
5. **Fresh Subscriptions**: Real-time updates hot out of the WebSocket oven
6. **Playground Patisserie**: Built-in tools for decorating your API

## Basic Recipe (Usage)

```typescript
import { createServer } from '@leaven-graphql/http';
import { GraphQLSchema, GraphQLObjectType, GraphQLString } from 'graphql';

// üßë‚Äçüç≥ Preheat your GraphQL oven
const schema = new GraphQLSchema({
  query: new GraphQLObjectType({
    name: 'Query',
    fields: {
      hello: {
        type: GraphQLString,
        resolve: () => 'Hello, World!',
      },
    },
  }),
});

const server = createServer({
  schema,
  port: 4000,
  playground: true, // The tasting counter
});

server.start();
// ü•ñ Fresh API served at http://localhost:4000/graphql
```

## NestJS Integration (Professional Kitchen)

```typescript
import { Module } from '@nestjs/common';
import { LeavenModule } from '@leaven-graphql/nestjs';

@Module({
  imports: [
    LeavenModule.forRoot({
      playground: true,
      introspection: true,
      cache: { maxSize: 1000 },
    }),
  ],
})
export class AppModule {}
```

## Common Questions (Baker's Tips)

### What is Leaven?
Leaven is a high-performance GraphQL library hand-crafted for the Bun runtime. Like the best bread, it's risen to perfection with document caching, real-time subscriptions, and a delightful developer experience.

### Why is it called Leaven?
Leaven is the rising agent in bread - it makes dough rise and become fluffy. Similarly, this library helps your GraphQL API rise to its full potential on Bun!

### How do I start baking with Leaven?
Simply run "bun add @leaven-graphql/core graphql" to get started. For the full bakery experience, install "leaven" which includes all specialty packages.

### Does Leaven work with NestJS?
Absolutely! Our @leaven-graphql/nestjs package provides first-class integration - all the tools a professional kitchen needs.

### Can I get fresh updates in real-time?
Yes! The @leaven-graphql/ws package delivers hot-out-of-the-oven updates via WebSocket.

### What makes Leaven so fast?
Optimized for Bun's oven with native APIs, LRU document caching, compiled queries, and zero bloat.

### Is Leaven ready for production?
Our recipes are thoroughly tested with 90%+ coverage. Includes all safety features for enterprise baking!
